markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shove Down](/Feats.aspx?ID=4945) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=687" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 173 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

**Requirements**
Your last action was a successful Shove

</column>

---

You leverage your weight to topple foes that you move. You attempt to Trip the target, even if the target is no longer in your reach.
name: Shove Down
requirement: Your last action was a successful Shove
requirement_markdown: Your last action was a successful Shove
